content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ dogs deserve to be cozy too and the **wheat stitch™ dog sweater** is designed to keep pups of all sizes warm and stylish with 8 sizes from xxs to 3x it s perfect for all doggies from tiny tail-waggers to big cuddle buddies made in simple row and rounds the construction is easy to follow and the * wheat stitch 1 * adds a beautiful cozy texture that looks as good as it feels the wheat stitch™ dog sweater has a simple one-piece construction we ll start with a simple neck ribbing then we ll work in row and rounds to create the sweater body with leg and harness holes whether you re making it for your own fur baby or as a sweet handmade gift this sweater is a fun and heartwarming project for any dog-loving crocheter a video tutorial showing the size extra small xs of the dog sweater is included with the pattern crochet hook g+ 4 5mm & h 5 0mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch markers 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 tape measure 6 yarn herrschners worsted 8 7 100% acrylic 489yds/226g yardage 105 145 205 275 405 535 640 680 yds 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 skeins yarn substitutions brava worsted 8 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g mighty stitch 9 80% acrylic/20% superwash wool 208yds/100g lion brand color theory 10 100% acrylic 246yds/100g herrschners worsted 8 heathers 11 100% acrylic 489yds/226g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain s - chain s flo - front loop only rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet scc2tog - single_crochet two together slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side gauge 14 sts and 12 row = 4 by 4 in st pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 sizes xxs xs s m l xl 2x 3x finished measurements included in the schematic skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 13 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 14 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 15 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 16 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 17 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 18 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved we understand that you may want to put your spin on things if you re feeling adventurous and want to make tweaks like using different yarn or adjusting sizing go for it however we kindly ask that you take full responsibility for any changes you make unfortunately we cannot support modifications outside of the patterns and video tutorial © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design
